Title: The Ascent of Chimborazo
Actors: Jan Josef Liefers, Monika Lennartz, Götz Schubert
Plot: In 1802, Alexandre De Humbolt and Aimé Bonpland stayed in Ecuador to study the topography of the country. Their goal is to climb the Chimborazo volcano, reaching 6,267 meters and considered at the time as the highest peak in the w...
